resources.string: You are currently in another live room. Please exit before entering a new live room.
Failed to start the camera. Please check your device.
Please enable camera access permissions.
Your camera is being used by another application. Please close it first.
Failed to start the camera. Please check your device.
Please disband the live room before exiting.
Please check your network connection and try again later.
This function does not support frequent operations.
Please check the screen recording permissions on your device.
The room has been closed or exited due to a network anomaly.
The maximum number of connected microphones in the room has been reached.
Please check if your microphone is turned on.
Please enable microphone access permissions.
Your microphone is being used by another application. Please close it first.
Failed to enable the microphone. Please check your device.
You need to request camera permissions from the room owner or administrator.
Please contact the room owner to unlock your camera permissions.
You need to request microphone permissions from the room owner or administrator.
Please contact the room owner to unlock your microphone permissions.
You need to request screen sharing permissions from the room owner or administrator.
Please contact the room owner to unlock your screen sharing permissions.
Please enter the live room first.
The current room type does not support this operation.
Failed to obtain permissions. Audio/video permissions are not currently authorized. Please check if the device permissions are enabled.
Duplicate request. Please try again later.
The room may be in a weak network environment. Please check.
The room may be in a weak network environment. Please check.
The room may be in a weak network environment or the operation is abnormal. Please check.
This feature is not yet available. Please contact the administrator.
Please recreate your room ID to ensure it meets the length and character requirements.
Please re-enter your room name to ensure it meets the length and character requirements.
The current room does not support preloading.
The application ID may have expired. Please contact the administrator.
Please log in to the live room service first.
The room may be in a weak network environment. Please check or contact the administrator.
The current room has enabled a ban on all members from speaking.
You have been muted in the current room.
Failed to start screen sharing. Please check if anyone in the room is already screen sharing.
Operation successful
You need room owner or administrator permissions to perform this operation.
You need room owner permissions to perform this operation.
User does not exist
Already on the microphone
Already in the microphone queue
The PK session does not exist or has ended
The PK session has ended
The current connection does not exist or has ended
Your PK request operations are too frequent. Please try again later.
Too many connections in a short period. Please try again later.
Please do not create rooms too frequently. Try again later.
The operation has reached the upper limit. Please contact the administrator.
Exceeded the upper limit for connections or battle rooms
The room is in another PK session
This operation is not supported
Invalid room type
The current room is connecting with other rooms
The room is in a PK session
The room is closing and resources are being released. Please close the room normally.
The room resources have reached the upper limit. Please contact the administrator.
The room resources have reached the upper limit. Please contact the administrator.
The room resources have reached the upper limit. Please contact the administrator.
The room resources have reached the upper limit. Please contact the administrator.
The microphone seat is locked. Please try another seat.
The live service is loading. Please contact the administrator.
Other rooms in the PK session may have been closed
Not a room member
Not in the microphone queue
The user has not yet connected to the microphone
The PK session has not yet started
The room may be in a weak network environment. Please check.
The current room requires a password to enter
The number of administrators exceeds the upper limit
The room may have been closed or disbanded
The room does not support microphone connections
Incorrect room entry password
The room ID is already in use. Please select another room ID.
The room ID is already occupied. Please try another one.
The room ID is already in use, and the operator is the room owner. It can be used directly.
The room is full
The room is already in a connection
The current microphone seat is occupied by another user
The room may be in a weak network environment. Please check.
The room may be in a weak network environment. Please check.
The number of tags exceeds the upper limit
The room is no longer in a PK session
The microphone connection list is empty
Microphone connections may have reached the upper limit
There is a pending PK request in the room
There is a pending connection request in the room
This member has been banned
This member has been muted
There is already a user on the microphone seat
You have been blacklisted by the administrator and cannot enter this room
The room may be in a weak network environment. Please check.
Frequent requests. Please try again later.
Sensitive words detected. Please modify and try again.
You have been muted in the current room.
The room may be in a weak network environment. Please check.
The content is too long. Please shorten it and try again.
The room has been disbanded
The room may be in a weak network environment. Please check or contact the administrator.
